transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Mr. Vijay ji bol rahe hain aapki testing se
Executive: Yes sir
Executive: Rahul sir main na Vijay Agarwal baat kar raha hun manager India Mart se baat kar raha hun sir main ye manager baat kar raha hun sir main
Customer: Okay sir aap thode time pehle abhi aapka utkarsh ke sath aapka conversation hua hoga sir aapka services ko leke
Executive: Yes yes yes
Executive: aur aapne us wali aapke whatsapp pe message gaya hoga conversation ko leke to aapne waha pe not satisfied mark kiya sir aapne
Customer: Yes sir main India Mart se not satisfied hun sir main personally nahi bheja hun unko India Mart ki taraf se bheja hun main
Executive: Okay to main sir reason janne ke liye call kiya tha ki aisa kya raha ki aap India Mart se
Customer: Sir aap reason janna chahte hain to ek bar mera account open karke dekh lijiye usme mere ko koi bhi by lead nahi mil rahi hai jo mere relevant ho inhone mujhe aaj ek by lead batai hai jo kal aayi hui thi wo mujhe aaj batai hai inhone aur wo already consume ho chuki hai kisi aur ne matlab consume kar li hai usko other person ne ab wo kya hota hai ki ek by lead maximum panch consumer le sakte hain na sir supplier
Executive: Sorry wo baki ek by lead jo hoti hai wo panch supplier consume karte hain maximum sir
Customer: One by lead is equal to five
Executive: One by lead is equal to five supplier sir
Customer: Okay
Executive: To uske baad wo sold out ho jati hai sir
Customer: Okay to mujhe kal batana chahiye tha na unko ye cheez wo aaj bata rahe hain mujhe jab wo sold out ho chuki hai
Executive: Sir wo kal sunday tha isliye wo bata nahi paye honge sir aapko to main utkarsh ko bol deta hu jaise koi by lead aapke relevant aayegi aapko main ek group banwa deta hu main theek hai to jo by lead aapke paas aayegi wo aapko directly share kar diya karenge sir jaise abhi raipur se kuch aayi thi by lead borewell drilling service ki aayi thi
Customer: Theek hai chhattisgarh se aayi hui thi koriya se aayi hui thi mujhe ek to show nahi kar raha tha koi bhi by lead
Executive: Sir ye aapne kiya hoga maine login
Customer: Haan abhi login kiya hun tab mujhe show hua usme
Executive: Ji to sir ye regular ji main keh raha hu ki utkarsh aapko whatsapp pe rakhega le apne whatsapp pe
Customer: To se kya naam hai utkarsh group bana deta hai theek hai to jaise morning me jab koi lead post hoti hai hamare portal pe wo aapko share kar diya karega sir taki jo by lead hai aap usko consume kar sake regular basis ke upar
Customer: Theek theek theek
Executive: To main aisa kaam karwa dunga sir aapke liye taki aapko by lead jo hai instantly aapko bheje aap usko consume kar liya kijiye sir kyuki kya hota hai ki sir supplier base jyada hai to wo agar aap actively aapne India Mart ka app download kar rakha hai apne paas sir
Customer: Hai already downloaded hai sir
Executive: To waise bhi sir jaise lead apne paas aati hai waise aapke paas notification bhi aapke paas aata hai iska ki aapke paas by lead aayi hai to aap usko turant ki turant consume kar le aap sir is cheez ko
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: To baki utkarsh abhi ek group bana ke aapko everyday jo bhi lead hamare portal pe aapke product se relevant aayegi sir wo aapko turant ki turant share kar diya karega taki aap by lead ko jo hai wo consume kar liya kare kare aap timely aur baki usne catalog quality score pe bhi kaam kiya hai aur sir thoda sa na aapko active rehne ki thodi si requirement hai sir kyuki aap matlab kafi time se na active bhi nahi ho portal ke upar sir aap hai na
Customer: Sir by lead aati nahi hai aap check kariye na by lead aayi ki tabhi to main ha main manta hu aari hai maine dekha hai maine dekha hai par aage par kam aari hai bilkul theek baat hai aapki ha bahut kam aari hai relevant nahi hai
Executive: Kyuki kyuki jo product line hai na apna service industry ka product line hai sir ek to apna theek hai
Customer: Ji to jyadatar jo hai aapke product ka sir main deal aap product me karte hain hamara services ka kaam hai na isliye problem hai
Executive: Yaha par service hai jaise bhi lekin abhi bhi chhattisgarh se main dekh raha hu borewell drilling service ki aayi hui hai aap jaise jharkhand aapka hai na main aapka chhattisgarh hai na
Customer: Chhattisgarh madhya pradesh sir
Executive: Chhattisgarh madhya pradesh ha ji to kuch jaise chhattisgarh se bhi jaise borewell drilling service ki to kafi sari requirement aapke portal pe lagi hui hai sir lekin abhi wo sold out ho gayi hai filhal sir wo abhi
Executive: To fayda ye hai ki agar jitni aap consume karenge lead apne local area ki utna fayda milega sir aapko service ka aur business ka
Customer: To agar aap waha pe kya naam hai abhi 50 minute pehle residential boring drilling service ki bhopal se bhi requirement aayi hui hai sir fir water borewell drilling service ki jabalpur se bhi aayi hui hai fir filling service ki bhopal se aayi hui hai to main bolunga ki utkarsh ko ki aapko regular basis ke upar MP ki SP ki aur chhattisgarh ki aapko requirement aapko bhej diya karega sir aapko
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Ab ye bhopal bhopal ki to location kar sakte hain capture aap bhopal ki bhi kar sakte hain sir
Customer: Theek hai bhopal ki aayenge bhopal ki bhejo sir ko bhopal ki aayegi by lead
Executive: Theek hai bhopal ki bhi aayi hui hai
Customer: Bhopal ki wo consume ho chuki hai sir main abhi call kiya tha
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir aage ka dhyan rakhenge jaise ye jabalpur ki bhi aayi hui thi aur bhopal se filling service ki bhi aayi hui thi sir theek hai
Customer: Theek hai theek hai
Executive: To kya naam hai utkarsh ko main personally bol diya wo aapko regular basis pe aapko whatsapp pe aapko share kar diya karega requirement sir aapko baki aap mera number save kar lijiyega vijay agarwal ke naam se sir aapko koi bhi kisi prakar ka koi bhi issue rehta hai mere ko ha ji sir
Customer: Okay thank you sir
Executive: Aapko koi bhi issue rehta hai mere ko directly bhi aap sampark is number pe sir aap theek hai theek theek
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: To main ek bar filhal aapka jo concern hai wo main close karwa deta hu sir yaha se theek hai sir okay sir baki koi dikkat ho to aap mujhe kabhi bhi aap call kar lijiye is number pe sir
Customer: Okay sir theek hai
Executive: Theek hai sir thank you so much sir have a nice day sir welcome sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- By lead shown was already consumed.

- Few by leads are showing.



Resolution:

- Executive will create a WhatsApp group.

- Utkarsh will share relevant by leads daily.

- Executive shared his contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, whatsapp group, resolution
